testcase.name: A valid email id is allowed
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to Page ForgotPassword.......................................passed When A User enters a valid email id.........................................passed And A User clicks on Retrieve password button...............................passed Then Application shows that the email has been sent.........................passed

testcase.name: An invalid email is not allowed

failure.message: Expected: not "Your e-mail's been sent!" but: was "Your e-mail's been sent!"

testcase.failure:
Given Navigate to Page ForgotPassword.......................................passed When A User enters a invalid email id.......................................passed And A User clicks on Retrieve password button...............................passed Then Application does not show that email has been sent.....................failed
